Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.34344868]Virus:SARS-CoV-2:inhibition of SARS-CoV-2 S protein-mediated cell-cell fusion(IC50=273.5±4.1 nM);inhibition of SARS-CoV-2 pseudovirus infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=2672.1±384.5 nM);SARS-CoV-2 D614G:inhibition of S protein-mediated cell-cell fusion(IC50=214.5±20.2 nM);inhibition of pseudovirus infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=1790.8±363.2 nM);SARS-CoV:inhibition of pseudovirus infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=4370.3±719.7 nM);MERS-CoV:inhibition of pseudovirus infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=499.8±163.3 nM);HCoV-NL63:inhibition of pseudovirus infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=487.2±41.3 nM);HCoV-229E:inhibition of pseudovirus infection in Huh-7 cells(IC50=1255.6±453.3 nM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Comments: The peptide is a fusion inhibitor against SARS-CoV-2.

Literature.Title: SARS-CoV-2-derived fusion inhibitor lipopeptides exhibit highly potent and broad-spectrum activity against divergent human coronaviruses.
Literature.Author: Zhu Y, Yu D, Hu Y, Wu T, Chong H, He Y.
